message: Let's coordinate to avoid collisions. I suggest we take turns moving: P1 goes first with 5 this round, then P2 next round, then P3. This way we all advance without blocking each other initially.

However, instead of taking turns with <move>5</move>, let’s diversify our moves early on—some of us can go for <move>3</move> or <move>1</move> to reduce the risk of overlap.
